messages.message: seeing `view-home-page` fail because there is a disabled button (presumably bc of loading state) cc @Serena should we increase the timeout here? It looks like you increased to 1 minute

i think the suggestion was to filter on `state=ACTIVE` https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C053QKXEL3B/p1715617349352389?thread_ts=1715615891.551429&cid=C053QKXEL3B

i have the local changes for this, but i never got around to testing it
if you want, you can try applying this patch and re-triggering a CI run
i’m curious what this part of the test is even for? presumably running apps is already covered by some other cypress test? not sure why we need to test for this in `view-home-page`
you’re right that other tests do cover this, we could remove the “Run app” check from `view-home-page` then
